wikipedia_page.main: Edmund Marsden (18 April 1881 – 26 May 1915) was an English British Army officer and cricketer. He played for Gloucestershire in 1909. He received his first commission as a second lieutenant in the Indian Staff Corps on 20 January 1900 and served with the 19 Madras Infantry. He was promoted to lieutenant on 20 April 1902.
